title: Enhancing Clinical Competency: Learning Design for Online Self-Regulated Motivation Management

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience with online learning tools, understanding of fundamental educational philosophy as a teacher
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more specific strategies for managing self-regulated motivation (MR) in an online environment.
Learners can analyze learning design (LD) elements to evaluate their impact on motivation regulation.
Learners can create a social studies lesson design plan reflecting their own motivation management methods based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
